name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box body and sleek foundry arms and legs, it stands out among its peers. Its screen, shaped like a snake, provides a unique display for data visualization. Volt is often seen wearing stylish shades as its signature accessory.
